title: qqwx
author: qqwx
content: P E R S E U SPerseus Fintech Digital AssetsPerseus Fintech S.A. is building an ecosystem to promote financial independence for it's users via advanced tools and premium educational content.P E R S E U SAbout usPerseus Fintech S.A. is an investment company listed on the Romanian Stock Exchange Market (BVB.ro) since 2012. At the beginning of 2022, the company started looking for investment opportunities into Cryptocurrencies and Blockchain based start-ups and projects, including NFTs.Contact:-Operational office: 17 Carbunarilor Str., 1st District, 013988, Bucharest – RomaniaRegistered office: 17 Carbunarilor Str., 1st District, 013988, Bucharest – RomaniaTelephone: +40 (0) 21.311.0087Official Contact Email Address: ir@perseustoken.comWebsite: https://perseustoken.com/Twitter: https://twitter.com/perseusfintechFacebook: https://web.facebook.com/perseusfintechTelegram: https://t.me/perseus_fintechDiscord: https://discord.com/invite/perseusfintechReddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/perseusfintech/

comments.body: What is the future development of future planning of this project? What is the benefit can we get users from the project? Sometimes we can see a lot of projects getting failed and its increasing day by day so every project should have a great plan.

comments.author: PerseusTeam
comments.body: Quote from: GoldenView on December 19, 2022, 11:34:36 AMWhat is the future development of future planning of this project? What is the benefit can we get users from the project? Sometimes we can see a lot of projects getting failed and its increasing day by day so every project should have a great plan. The goal is to build an ecosystem to promote financial independence for its users via advanced tools and premium educational content. As a first step, an innovative platform for crypto-trading supported by AI has been released on Friday the 16th, 3 days after the 1° listing on a CEX. Please check our full roadmap on https://perseustoken.com/ or follow our social media.

comments.body: Checked Perseus (PRS) token on dex-trade and Found a really awesome movement, 24h Volume of PRS token is $51.2K. Its really cool things and the price of PRS token now $0.298, that's good enough of a new project. Good luck for Perseus Fintech. What is next movement? .
